Dictionary.description: -- Definition -- The grammatical gender of a geographical name.

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Masculine grammatical gender.
-- Description -- EXAMPLES Sena (Spanish), Schwarzwald (German).
Definition.name: masculine

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Feminine grammatical gender.
-- Description -- EXAMPLES Seine (French), ForÃªt Noire (French).
Definition.name: feminine

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Neuter grammatical gender.
-- Description -- EXAMPLES Zwarte Woud (Dutch), Rheinland (German).
Definition.name: neuter

Definition.description: -- Definition -- 'Common' grammatical gender (the merging of 'masculine' and 'feminine').
Definition.name: common
